Include details, not shown above, re time, place, manner of last entry, and elements which establish admin- istrative and/or criminal violation. Indicate means and route of travel to interior.) he above described subject is a citizen of Mexico, she has never been admitted to the United States for permanent residency. The subject last entered the United States as set forth above for the purpose of finding employment. he subject entered with her four children and they are presently attending school here in the United States. he subject's huband who is also here in the United States illegally, entered the United States in June 1971. The Subject has no equity in the United States,, and is being extended a I-210 letter until 5/6/72. Children. FOIA (b)(6) PER INSTRUCTIONS OF INVESTIGATOR E. EDWARDS.
